Title: Relates to approval of electric transmission line facilities
Summary: Provides that, prior to granting a certificate for the construction of an electric transmission line facility, the public service commission must find that the facility conforms to the most recent state energy plan and consider whether approval of the facility would cause adverse impacts on the state's environmental quality due to electric generation.
LawCode: Amd ยง126, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to approval of electric transmission line facilities
